text:
I created a new HTTP request and Regular expression extractor as its post
processor. I want to extract Location value from the HTTP-header. The problem
is: when entered (clicked) the Regular expression extractor changes its Responce
field check value to "body". It should keep its value "headers" as I set it in
the begining.
creator: ilkka.kekkonen@helsinki.fi
sebb@apache.org
text:
This has been fixed in CVS and will be included in the next release

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 29853 ***
